about_the_game:
Soccering is a physics-based game where the objective is to control a sphere throughout the field and make the ball go inside of your opponent goal.

While jumping, you can use a small dash in either direction, or up. But remember it takes 5 seconds to load again.

In the arcade mode, there are items you can collect to temporarily change the behavior of the players, bringing funny situations to the game.

Play with your friends


You can play 1 x 1, 1 x 2 or 2 x 2. There's also a coop mode where you can test your skills against CPU with a friend.

Press the square brackets ( "[" and "]" ) to navigate between the sound tracks.

How to customize Field and Players?


Soccering allows you to customize the Field and the Players skins. The instructions for this are following:
  1. Open the Steam Client > Right click on Soccering > Properties > Local Files > BROWSE LOCAL FILES
  2. Look inside the "conf" directory. There are the template files (player_.png and field_.png) for Players and the Field, as well the instructions of how to save the images... Pick your favorite image editor, create your images and play with your own artwork.
Please feel free to share your images at Artwork tab in the Soccering Community

Thanks for your support!

short_description: Soccering is the little sibling of Volleying! Thus, as another physics-based game, it also gives the players more control over their moves, delivering unique matches each round. Invite your friends over or play remotely and enjoy this predictably unpredictable experience!
